about_the_game:
Pixel Pack 3
Sideview Enemies

A huge collection of unique sideview enemies that will be great for creating your own unique fantasy world!

Sizes between 300px Height to 900px Height.

Pack Contents:
Sideview Enemies: 70

All in two different sizes for you to scale the way you like.


Pixel packs from Sloppy Joe Studios can be used in both Commercial & Non-commercial games.
